Class CustomerWebServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gwtsystem.server.service.CustomerWebServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.RemoteService, ICustomerWebService

    @Service(value="customerWebService")
public class CustomerWebServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICustomerWebService
    Server implementation of GWT interface for handle operations in applications and call methods of service layer classes Created by alexanderleonovich on 02.08.15.
